mapper.delete: delete from ujcms_channel_ext where id_ in (select t.id_ from ujcms_channel t where t.site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update ujcms_channel_ext set static_file_ = #{staticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_static_file_ = #{mobileStaticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editor_type_ = #{editorType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, text_ = #{text,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, markdown_ = #{markdown,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_channel_ext (id_, static_file_, mobile_static_file_, editor_type_, text_, markdown_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{staticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileStaticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editorType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{text,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{markdown,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.static_file_, t.mobile_static_file_, t.editor_type_, t.text_, t.markdown_
